name: Vicious Vine - Miz Jam 1
description:
My submission for the Miz Jam 1. You had 48 hours to create whatever you wanted but you must use the provided art kit.

Be a worm and wreak havoc on the land. Go through levels and make the farmers regret ever farming near your forest. Use your hands to swing your body around, sticking to anything you come into contact with.

Features
  • Controller support
  • 15 unique levels
  • Local Co-op
